steps.content: Hallo! Wir schauen uns zunächst ein paar allgemeine Bedienelemente an.
Hier kann die gewünschte LRA ausgewählt werden.
Hier kann der Bereich ausgewählt werden, es werden dann die Daten für alle in diesem Bereich veröffentlichten Podcasts ***zusammengefasst*** angezeigt.
Hier kann ein ***spezifischer Podcast*** ausgewählt werden. Wenn vorher ein Bereich gewählt wurden, stehen hier nur die Podcasts des ausgewählten Bereichs zur Auswahl.

Hier können spezifische ***Episoden*** ausgewählt werden, die betrachtet bzw. verglichen werden sollen. Das funktioniert jedoch nur, wenn vorher ein Podcast gewählt wurde. Bei Bereichsbetrachtungen können nur alle Episoden zusammengefasst betrachtet werden.

Man muss nicht einmal wissen welcher Sender den Podcast produziert, hier sind alle! Einfach den gesuchten Podcast im Freitextfeld eingeben.
Damit die anderen Auswahlbereiche funktionieren muss hier "***None***" stehen.

Hier kann der ***Zeitraum*** für Langzeit-Beobachtungen eingestellt werden.

Standardmäßig sind hier die letzten 30 verfügbaren Tage ausgewählt.

***Letztes Update*** bezieht sich darauf, wann zuletzt Daten abgerufen wurden. 

***Datenstand*** bezieht sich darauf, für welchen Zeitraum Daten vorliegen. In Minerva sind allgemein nur Podcastdaten ab dem 01.01.2021 verfügbar. Neue Daten werden mit einem Zeitversatz von 5 Tagen importiert.
***Zugriffe:*** Herunterladen eines Podcasts unabhängig von der genutzten Plattform, Messung auf Basis von externen AV-Serverlogfiles.

Durchschnittliche Zugriffe pro Episode für die im ausgewählten Analysezeitraum veröffentlichten Episoden (z.B. alle Episoden aus dem Vormonat mit ihren Zugriffen im Vormonat).

Weitere Informationen hier

Anteile unterschiedlicher ***Player Apps*** bei Podcastdownloads. Unter "Other" fallen u.a. Browser Zugriffe.

Weitere Informationen hier
Jetzt bitte die Abschnitte 1a und 1b einklappen und in Abschnitt 2 mit der Tour fortfahren

options.content: ### Auf dem orangenen Punkt gehts los!

targets.rawSql:
SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", GREATEST(0,$filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('$Podcast_title'))), '$Podcast_title'), 
FROM(
SELECT '$Podcast_title' as Interaktionen
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
LIMIT 1
)

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", GREATEST($filled_size_headline_small - CHAR_LENGTH('QApps'),0)), 'Apps')
FROM(
SELECT 'Apps' as Interaktionen
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
LIMIT 1
)

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(summe as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(summe) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", "."))FROM
(
SELECT 
  SUM(m_zugriffe_1) AS summe 
FROM $episode_dataset
WHERE 
CASE "$Bereich"
WHEN "Alle Bereiche" THEN TRUE
ELSE branding = "$Bereich" END 
AND CASE """${Podcast:text}"""
WHEN "All titles" THEN TRUE
ELSE  broadcast_id = "$broadcast_id_branding" END
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
)

panels.description: Durchschnitt pro Episode für die im ausgewählten Analysezeitraum veröffentlichten Episoden.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_big - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(ROUND(summe,0) as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(summe) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", "."))FROM
(
SELECT
  SUM(zugriffe)/COUNT(DISTINCT headline) as summe,
FROM (
  SELECT
    FIRST_VALUE(publication_date_1) OVER (PARTITION BY headline ORDER BY publication_date_1 DESC) AS publication_date_2,
    headline,
    SUM(m_zugriffe_1) AS zugriffe,
  FROM $episode_dataset as ed
  LEFT JOIN $profiles_dataset as pd
  ON ed.podcast_title = pd.podcast_title
WHERE CASE "$Bereich"
WHEN "Alle Bereiche" THEN TRUE
ELSE ed.branding = "$Bereich" END
AND  CASE "$Podcast"
WHEN "All titles" THEN TRUE
ELSE REPLACE(ed.podcast_title,'"','') = """$Podcast""" END
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
AND $episodenschnitt_condition
  GROUP BY
    publication_date_1,
    headline
  ORDER BY
    zugriffe DESC )
    WHERE DATE(publication_date_2) BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
)

panels.title: Ø neue Episoden

panels.description: Zugriffe über ausgewählte Apps auf Basis von User Agents. Im Vergleich zu den eigenen Metriken der jeweiligen Plattform-Anbieter kann es aufgrund verschiedener Messmethoden zu Abweichungen kommen.

targets.rawSql:
WITH broadcastids AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT CAST(broadcast_id[0] AS STRING) AS broadcast_id
    FROM $profiles_dataset
    WHERE CASE "$Bereich"
    WHEN "Alle Bereiche" THEN TRUE
    ELSE branding = "$Bereich" END 
    ORDER BY broadcast_id DESC
),
all_titles_platforms AS(
SELECT 
    SUM(m_zugriffe_1) AS summe, 
    platform
FROM $platform_dataset as podcast_platform
INNER JOIN broadcastids ON podcast_platform.broadcast_id = broadcastids.broadcast_id
WHERE date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
GROUP BY platform),
not_all_titles_platforms AS(
    SELECT
  sum(m_zugriffe_1) AS summe, platform
FROM $platform_dataset
WHERE
broadcast_id = "$broadcast_id_branding"
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
group by platform
)
SELECT * FROM ${dataset}

panels.description: Zugriffe gesamt aller Podcast-Reihen im ausgewählten Bereich

targets.rawSql:
SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_big - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(summe as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(summe) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", "."))FROM
(
SELECT
  SUM(m_zugriffe_1) AS summe
FROM $episode_dataset
WHERE
CASE "$Bereich"
WHEN "Alle Bereiche" THEN TRUE
ELSE branding = "$Bereich" END
AND headline != "All headlines"
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
)

panels.description: Zugriffe gesamt für die in der Navigation unter Episode ausgewählten Audios

targets.rawSql:
SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(summe as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(summe) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", "."))FROM
(
SELECT 
  SUM(m_zugriffe_1) AS summe 
FROM $episode_dataset
WHERE 
CASE "$Bereich"
WHEN "Alle Bereiche" THEN TRUE
ELSE branding = "$Bereich" END 
AND CASE """${Podcast:text}"""
WHEN "All titles" THEN TRUE
ELSE  broadcast_id = "$broadcast_id_branding" END
AND CASE """${Podcast:text}"""
WHEN "All titles" THEN TRUE
ELSE REPLACE(headline,"'","") IN UNNEST(ARRAY_CONCAT(ARRAY[$Episode], ARRAY['None'])) END
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
)

(
  SELECT 
  SAFE_DIVIDE(SUM(m_zugriffe_1),COUNT(DISTINCT headline)) as summe 
FROM $episode_dataset
WHERE 
CASE "$Bereich"
WHEN "Alle Bereiche" THEN TRUE
ELSE branding = "$Bereich" END 
AND CASE """${Podcast:text}"""
WHEN "All titles" THEN TRUE
ELSE  broadcast_id = "$broadcast_id_branding" END
AND CASE """${Podcast:text}"""
WHEN "All titles" THEN TRUE
ELSE REPLACE(headline,"'","") IN UNNEST(ARRAY_CONCAT(ARRAY[$Episode], ARRAY['None'])) END
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin"))

steps.content:
Hier sieht man die Plattformaufteilung im Tagesverlauf.

Mit einem Klick auf die Legende können einzelne Plattformen an- und abgewählt werden.
Hier findet ihr die Top 3 Episoden eurer Auswahl.
Abschnitt 2 einklappen und in Abschnitt 3 mit der Tour fortfahren

targets.rawSql:
WITH broadcastids AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT CAST(broadcast_id[0] AS STRING) AS broadcast_id
    FROM $profiles_dataset
    WHERE CASE "$Bereich"
    WHEN "Alle Bereiche" THEN TRUE
    ELSE branding = "$Bereich" END 
    ORDER BY broadcast_id DESC
),
all_titles_platforms AS(
SELECT 
    SUM(m_zugriffe_1) AS summe, 
    platform,
    date
FROM $platform_dataset as pd
INNER JOIN broadcastids ON pd.broadcast_id = broadcastids.broadcast_id
WHERE date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
GROUP BY platform, date),
not_all_titles_platforms AS(
    SELECT
  sum(m_zugriffe_1) AS summe, platform,
  date
FROM $platform_dataset
WHERE
broadcast_id = "$broadcast_id_branding"
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
group by platform, date
),
ard_data AS (
  SELECT summe, date FROM 
  ${dataset}
  WHERE platform = "ARD Audiothek"
),
apple_data AS
(
    SELECT summe, date FROM 
  ${dataset}
  WHERE platform = "Apple Podcasts"
),
spotify_data AS
(
  SELECT summe as summe, date FROM 
  ${dataset}
  WHERE platform = "Spotify"
),
rest AS(
  SELECT SUM(summe) as summe, date FROM 
  ${dataset}
  WHERE platform != "ARD Audiothek" AND platform != "Apple Podcasts" AND platform != "Spotify"
  GROUP BY date
)
SELECT
  ${dataset}.date,
  ard_data.summe as ard_summe, 
  apple_data.summe as apple_summe, 
  spotify_data.summe as spotify_summe,
  rest.summe as rest_summe,
  COALESCE(ard_data.summe,0) + COALESCE(apple_data.summe, 0) + COALESCE(spotify_data.summe,0) + COALESCE(rest.summe,0) as zugriffe,
  "${type}" as type,
  DATE_DIFF(DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin"),DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin"),DAY) + 1 as timeRange
FROM ${dataset}
LEFT JOIN ard_data ON ${dataset}.date = ard_data.date
LEFT JOIN apple_data ON ${dataset}.date = apple_data.date
LEFT JOIN spotify_data ON ${dataset}.date = spotify_data.date
LEFT JOIN rest ON ${dataset}.date = rest.date
GROUP BY ${dataset}.date, ard_data.summe, apple_data.summe, spotify_data.summe, rest.summe
ORDER by date ASC

SELECT
  headline,
  SUM(zugriffe) as zugriffe,
FROM (
  SELECT
    FIRST_VALUE(publication_date_1) OVER (PARTITION BY headline ORDER BY publication_date_1 DESC) AS publication_date_2,
    REPLACE(podcast_title,'"','') as podcast_title,
      broadcast_id,
    headline,
    SUM(m_zugriffe_1) AS zugriffe,
    SUM(m_technische_nutzer) AS technische_nutzer,
  FROM $episode_dataset
WHERE 
CASE "$Bereich"
WHEN "Alle Bereiche" THEN TRUE
ELSE branding = "$Bereich" END
AND CASE """${Podcast}"""
WHEN "All titles" THEN True
ELSE REPLACE(podcast_title,'"','') = """$Podcast""" END
AND  headline != "All headlines" 
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
  GROUP BY
    publication_date_1,
    podcast_title,
    headline,
      broadcast_id
  ORDER BY
    zugriffe DESC )
GROUP BY
  publication_date_2,
  podcast_title,
  headline, 
  broadcast_id

ORDER BY 2 DESC
LIMIT 3

steps.content:
Hier findet ihr die ***Top 1000 Episoden*** der aktuellen Auswahl. 
Hier lohnt es sich, die Filtersymbole zu nutzen; so können z.B. nur spezifische Episoden eines Bereichs angezeigt werden.
Abschnitt 3 einklappen und in Abschnitt 4 die Tour fortsetzen

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  DATE(publication_date_2) as publication_date_2,
  podcast_title,
    broadcast_id,
  headline,
  SUM(zugriffe) as zugriffe
  --SUM(technische_nutzer)
FROM (
  SELECT
    FIRST_VALUE(publication_date_1) OVER (PARTITION BY headline ORDER BY publication_date_1 DESC) AS publication_date_2,
    REPLACE(podcast_title,'"','') AS podcast_title,
      broadcast_id,
    headline,
    SUM(m_zugriffe_1) AS zugriffe,
    SUM(m_technische_nutzer) AS technische_nutzer
    --SUM(m_technische_nutzer) AS technische_nutzer,
  FROM $episode_dataset
WHERE CASE "$Bereich"
WHEN "Alle Bereiche" THEN TRUE
ELSE branding = "$Bereich" END
AND  CASE "$Podcast"
WHEN "All titles" THEN TRUE
ELSE REPLACE(podcast_title,'"','') = """$Podcast""" END
AND CASE "${Podcast:text}"
WHEN "All titles" THEN TRUE
ELSE REPLACE(headline,"'","") IN UNNEST(ARRAY_CONCAT(ARRAY[$Episode], ARRAY['None'])) END
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
  GROUP BY
    publication_date_1,
    podcast_title,
    headline,
      broadcast_id
  ORDER BY
    zugriffe DESC )
GROUP BY
  publication_date_2,
  podcast_title,
  headline, 
  broadcast_id

ORDER BY zugriffe DESC
LIMIT 1000

steps.content:
Der ***technische Nutzer*** gibt an, wie viele unterschiedliche Clients (IP-Adresse +User-Agent) auf ein Angebot zugegriffen haben. ***Wichtig:*** Es handelt sich um eine ***technische Reichweite***, **keine** Personenreichweite.

Dieser Wert kann nur für einzelne Podcasts bereitgestellt werden, da ein Aufsummieren über mehrere Angebote unzulässig wäre.
steps.panelTitle: Zugriffe und Technische Nutzer pro Tag

steps.content:
Hier findet ihr ein Ranking aller Podcastreihen.

Es kann nach den Zugriffen insgesamt oder nach den Zugriffen auf einer der Plattformen sortiert werden.

targets.rawSql: SELECT "Podcast", "ARD Audiothek", "Spotifiy", "Apple Podcasts", "Zugriffe Gesamt"

panels.description: Technische Nutzer pro Tag sind NICHT gleichzusetzen mit Hörer:innen. Sie beschreiben die Anzahl der unterschiedlichen Clients, die mindestens ein Audio einer Podcast-Reihe heruntergeladen haben (Berechnung auf Basis von IP Adresse und User Agent).

targets.rawSql:
WITH 
not_all_titles_platforms AS(
    SELECT
  sum(m_zugriffe_1) AS vu,
  SUM(m_technische_nutzer) AS tu,
  date
FROM Piano.NDR_podcast_show_daily_f_mapped
WHERE
broadcast_id = "$broadcast_id_branding"
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
group by date)
SELECT date, 
vu, 
tu,
"${type}" as type,
DATE_DIFF(DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin"),DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin"),DAY) + 1 as timeRange
FROM not_all_titles_platforms
ORDER by date ASC

panels.title: Zugriffe und Technische Nutzer pro Tag

targets.rawSql:
WITH broadcastids AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT CAST(broadcast_id[0] AS STRING) AS broadcast_id, podcast_title
    FROM $profiles_dataset
    WHERE CASE "$Bereich"
    WHEN "Alle Bereiche" THEN TRUE 
    ELSE branding = "$Bereich" END 
    AND CASE """$Podcast"""
WHEN "All titles" THEN TRUE
ELSE CAST(broadcast_id[0] AS STRING) = "$broadcast_id_branding" END
    ORDER BY broadcast_id DESC
),
all_titles_platforms AS(SELECT 
podcast_title as Title,
1 as join_key,
sum(m_zugriffe_1) as zugriffe,
platform
FROM $platform_dataset as pd
INNER JOIN broadcastids ON pd.broadcast_id = broadcastids.broadcast_id
WHERE date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
GROUP BY platform, podcast_title),
technische_nutzer_summe AS(
  SELECT podcast_title as Title,
  1 as join_key,
  ROUND(sum(m_technische_nutzer)/$number_of_days) as technische_nutzer
  FROM $episode_dataset
WHERE 
CASE "$Bereich"
  WHEN "Alle Bereiche"
  THEN TRUE 
  ELSE 
branding = "$Bereich" END
AND CASE """$Podcast"""
WHEN "All titles" THEN True
ELSE podcast_title = """$Podcast""" END 
AND headline != "All headlines"
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
GROUP BY podcast_title),
main_data AS(
SELECT Title, join_key, sum(zugriffe) as zugriffe
FROM all_titles_platforms
GROUP BY Title, join_key),
ard_data AS (
  SELECT Title, zugriffe, join_key FROM 
  all_titles_platforms
  WHERE platform = "ARD Audiothek"
),
apple_data AS
(
    SELECT Title, zugriffe, join_key FROM 
  all_titles_platforms
  WHERE platform = "Apple Podcasts"
),
spotify_data AS
(
  SELECT Title, zugriffe, join_key FROM 
  all_titles_platforms
  WHERE platform = "Spotify"
)
SELECT
  main_data.Title, 
  main_data.zugriffe,
  --technische_nutzer_summe.technische_nutzer, 
  ard_data.zugriffe as ard_summe, 
  apple_data.zugriffe as apple_summe, 
  spotify_data.zugriffe as spotify_summe
FROM main_data
LEFT JOIN ard_data ON (main_data.join_key = ard_data.join_key AND main_data.Title = ard_data.Title)
LEFT JOIN apple_data ON (main_data.join_key = apple_data.join_key AND main_data.Title = apple_data.Title)
LEFT JOIN spotify_data ON (main_data.join_key = spotify_data.join_key AND main_data.Title = spotify_data.Title)
--LEFT JOIN technische_nutzer_summe on (main_data.join_key = technische_nutzer_summe.join_key AND main_data.Title = technische_nutzer_summe.Title)
ORDER BY main_data.zugriffe DESC

query.rawSql:
SELECT a.LRA
FROM (
SELECT "NDR" as LRA
) as a
ORDER BY (
  CASE
    WHEN REGEXP_CONTAINS(LOWER("${__user.email}"), LOWER(a.LRA))
    THEN 1
    ELSE 0
  END
) DESC

SELECT 
FORMAT_DATETIME("%d.%m.%Y", DATE(MAX(date)))
FROM $episode_dataset
WHERE CASE WHEN "$Bereich" = "Alle Bereiche" THEN TRUE
ELSE CASE WHEN "$Podcast" = "All titles" THEN TRUE
ELSE broadcast_id = "${broadcast_id_branding}" END END

SELECT 
CASE 
  WHEN '$Podcast' = 'All titles' 
  THEN '$Bereich – alle Podcastreihen'
  ELSE '$Podcast'
END

SELECT 
    CASE """$AllePodcasts"""
    WHEN "None"
    THEN "True"
    ELSE CAST(""" REPLACE(podcast_title,'"','') = "$AllePodcasts" """ as string) 
    END

SELECT CASE """${Podcast}"""
WHEN "All titles" THEN "all_titles_platforms"
ELSE "not_all_titles_platforms" END

SELECT branding FROM (SELECT DISTINCT branding, 1 as sort 
FROM   $profiles_dataset
WHERE $AllePodcastsCondition
UNION DISTINCT
SELECT CASE
WHEN "$AllePodcasts" = "None" THEN "Alle Bereiche" END, 0 as sort)
WHERE branding != ""
Order by sort, branding ASC

WITH all_podcasts AS(
  SELECT podcast_title FROM $profiles_dataset
  WHERE branding = "$Bereich"
  UNION ALL
  SELECT "All titles" as podcast_title 
)
SELECT podcast_title FROM(
SELECT DISTINCT REPLACE(podcast_title,'"','') AS podcast_title, CASE podcast_title WHEN "All titles" THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS sort  FROM all_podcasts
WHERE $AllePodcastsCondition
ORDER BY sort,podcast_title DESC
)
ORDER BY SORT, LOWER(podcast_title) ASC

SELECT REPLACE(headline,"'","") FROM(
SELECT DISTINCT headline, CASE headline WHEN "All headlines" THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS sort  FROM $episode_dataset
WHERE 
branding = "$Bereich" 
AND REPLACE(podcast_title,'"','') = """$Podcast"""
AND date > "2022-01-01"
AND headline != "All headlines"
ORDER BY sort,headline DESC
--ORDER BY podcast_title ASC
)
ORDER BY SORT, headline ASC
SELECT CAST(CHAR_LENGTH('$Podcast_title') + 10 AS STRING)
SELECT CAST(CHAR_LENGTH('$Podcast_title') + 10 AS STRING)

SELECT COALESCE(broadcast_id[0]) 
FROM $profiles_dataset
WHERE 
branding = "$Bereich" 
AND REPLACE(podcast_title,'"','') = """$Podcast"""

        WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 AND "$LRA" = "NDR" AND "$Bereich" = "NDR 90,3" AND "$broadcast_id_branding" = "" THEN "https://cdn-assets-eu.frontify.com/s3/frontify-enterprise-files-eu/eyJwYXRoIjoibm9yZGRldXRzY2hlci1ydW5kZnVua1wvYWNjb3VudHNcL2E1XC80MDAxMTgyXC9wcm9qZWN0c1wvMTNcL2Fzc2V0c1wvM2JcLzgxOVwvMmY0ZDczYTFkYWU1OWVmYmM4NWY3YzhlODgwNTgwYmMtMTY1MDQ0MjMwMy5qcGcifQ:norddeutscher-rundfunk:oCxfVO8es9CwKcWtE71_1X0jed2e7AuB6zWTIClXjQU?width=2400"
        WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 AND "$LRA" = "NDR" AND "$Bereich" = "NDR 1 Radio MV" AND "$broadcast_id_branding" = "" THEN "https://cdn-assets-eu.frontify.com/s3/frontify-enterprise-files-eu/eyJwYXRoIjoibm9yZGRldXRzY2hlci1ydW5kZnVua1wvYWNjb3VudHNcL2E1XC80MDAxMTgyXC9wcm9qZWN0c1wvMThcL2Fzc2V0c1wvY2NcLzkyMlwvNTQ5OWEyOGJkYmMxZTY2YjlmYTBhOTUyNmU0YzUzOGYtMTY1MDQ0ODI1NC5qcGcifQ:norddeutscher-rundfunk:XNlgWY1sGUwnrol98RYiWpBC3RxRi24hwB_pmYOjGxY?width=2400"
        WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 AND "$LRA" = "NDR" AND "$Bereich" = "Sportschau" AND "$broadcast_id_branding" = "" THEN "https://share.ard-zdf-box.de/apps/files_sharing/publicpreview/d3JyzdAbr4jmimG?file=/&fileId=259065425&x=2560&y=1440&a=true&etag=1abf7e86e7ef727f72ffdb803cd8d05a"
        WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 AND "$LRA" = "NDR" AND "$Bereich" = "Tagesschau" AND "$broadcast_id_branding" = "" THEN "https://share.ard-zdf-box.de/apps/files_sharing/publicpreview/wNi9i6qxrr6F7w5?file=/&fileId=259065467&x=2560&y=1440&a=true&etag=60b50b9cfcc81c41877602f1c610f24a"
        WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 AND "$LRA" = "NDR" THEN '$NDR_default_image'
        WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 AND "$LRA" = "MDR" THEN '$MDR_default_image'
        ELSE MAX(coverart)
    END AS coverart
FROM image;

SELECT  
  CASE 
    WHEN (DATE_DIFF(DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin"), DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin"), DAY) + 1) < 7 THEN "bar"
    ELSE "line"
  END;

SELECT "https://cdn-assets-eu.frontify.com/s3/frontify-enterprise-files-eu/eyJwYXRoIjoibm9yZGRldXRzY2hlci1ydW5kZnVua1wvZmlsZVwvUXhLeVZObTkxemdFTTkxcmhIbnAuanBnIn0:norddeutscher-rundfunk:180WVEn3aprq-qhbFSwOtq-KZKuRXLnHIopbn4yYmvk?width=2400" -- rechteckiges Social Media NDR
--"https://api.ardmediathek.de/image-service/images/urn:ard:image:02f00fc2617f6b55?w=256&ch=e14976ec4f71faec" Quadratische NDR Dachmarke
--"https://www.ndr.de/der_ndr/unternehmen/logoihrndr100_v-contentxl.jpg" Rechteckickes NDR Logo

SELECT 
CASE MAX(tmstp)
  WHEN NULL THEN "N/A"
  ELSE FORMAT_DATETIME("%d.%m.%Y | %H:%M Uhr", DATETIME((TIMESTAMP(MAX(tmstp))),"Europe/Berlin") )
  END
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.NDR_podcast_episode_daily_f`
WHERE date > DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 10 day)
AND CASE WHEN "$Bereich" = "Alle Bereiche" THEN TRUE
ELSE CASE WHEN "$Podcast" = "All titles" THEN TRUE
ELSE broadcast_id = "${broadcast_id_branding}" END END

SELECT CASE "$Podcast"
WHEN "All titles" THEN ""
ELSE "_mapped" END

-- SELECT "https://cdn.mdr.de/presse/logos/mdr-dachmarke-100_v-variantBig16x9_wm-true_zc-ecbbafc6.png?version=17833"
SELECT "https://share.ard-zdf-box.de/apps/files_sharing/publicpreview/Sxorbc6WLzk84iy?file=/&fileId=257042098&x=2132&y=1104&a=true&etag=31cb74f497586f722c788a3861963167"

list.description: Verwenden Sie das Dropdown-Menü "AllePodcasts". In diesem Menü finden Sie alle von uns geführten Podcasts. Soll diese Option nicht verwendet werden, muss der Wert auf "None" gesetzt werden.
list.label: Podcastsuche:
list.name: AllePodcasts

query.rawSql:
SELECT podcast_title FROM(
(SELECT DISTINCT REPLACE(podcast_title,'"','') AS podcast_title,  1 AS sort  FROM $profiles_dataset
ORDER BY sort,podcast_title DESC
)
UNION ALL (SELECT "None", -1 as sort)
)
ORDER BY SORT, LOWER(podcast_title) ASC

WITH toDate AS(
  SELECT CASE 
  WHEN DATE(TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}'),'Europe/Berlin') >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 5 DAY) THEN DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 5 DAY)
  ELSE DATE(TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}'),'Europe/Berlin') END AS bisDatum
)
SELECT CAST(DATE_DIFF(bisDatum,DATE(TIMESTAMP('${__from:date:iso}'),'Europe/Berlin'), DAY) + 1 AS STRING)
FROM toDate

SELECT CASE "$LRA"
WHEN "NDR" THEN "_mapped"
WHEN "MDR" THEN "" END

SELECT CASE "$LRA"
WHEN "NDR" THEN "Piano.NDR_podcast_episode_daily_f_mapped"
WHEN "MDR" THEN "Piano.MDR_podcast_episode_daily_f" END

SELECT CASE "$LRA"
WHEN "NDR" THEN "Piano.NDR_podcast_platform_daily_f_mapped"
WHEN "MDR" THEN "Piano.MDR_podcast_platform_daily_f" END

SELECT CASE "$LRA"
WHEN "NDR" THEN "Piano.NDR_podcast_profiles"
WHEN "MDR" THEN "Piano.MDR_podcast_profiles_mapping" END

SELECT CASE CONTAINS_SUBSTR("""${zeitraum}""", "DATE_ADD")
WHEN True  THEN "## Hinweis: Für den ausgewählten Zeitraum liegen keine Daten vor."
ELSE """## Der ausgewertete Zeitraum lautet: $fromDay - $toDay """
END

--Um Daten auswerten zu können, bitte gestern oder größere Zeiträume auswählen.
SELECT FORMAT_DATE("%d.%m.%y",DATE(TIMESTAMP('${__from:date:iso}'),'Europe/Berlin'))

SELECT CASE 
-- case: last x<24 hours
    WHEN TIMESTAMP_DIFF(TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}'), TIMESTAMP('${__from:date:iso}'), HOUR) = 24 AND EXTRACT(DAY FROM DATETIME('${__from:date:iso}', "Europe/Berlin")) != EXTRACT(DAY FROM DATETIME('${__to:date:iso}', "Europe/Berlin")) OR TIMESTAMP_DIFF(TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}'), TIMESTAMP('${__from:date:iso}'), MINUTE) < 1439
    THEN   FORMAT_DATE("%d.%m.%y",DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE,INTERVAL 1 DAY))
-- SECOND case: today or bigger
    WHEN EXTRACT(DATE FROM TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}')) >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE("Europe/Berlin"), INTERVAL 4 DAY) AND EXTRACT(DATE FROM TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}')) >= "$datenstand_not_formated"
    THEN "$datenstand"
    WHEN EXTRACT(DATE FROM TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}')) >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE("Europe/Berlin"), INTERVAL 4 DAY) AND EXTRACT(DATE FROM TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}')) < "$datenstand_not_formated"
    THEN FORMAT_DATE("%d.%m.%y",DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE("Europe/Berlin"), INTERVAL 5 DAY))
ELSE CASE 
WHEN EXTRACT(DATE FROM TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}')) >= "$datenstand_not_formated" THEN "$datenstand"
ELSE FORMAT_DATE("%d.%m.%y",DATE_SUB(DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin"), INTERVAL 0 DAY))
END 
END
--    WHEN EXTRACT(DATE FROM TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}')) >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE("Europe/Berlin"), INTERVAL 4 DAY) 
--    THEN FORMAT_DATE("%d.%m.%y",DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE("Europe/Berlin"), INTERVAL 5 DAY))
--ELSE FORMAT_DATE("%d.%m.%y",DATE_SUB(DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin"), INTERVAL 0 DAY))
--END

current.text: (EXTRACT(DATE from DATETIME(time, "Europe/Berlin")) BETWEEN DATE('2024-06-30T22:00:00.000Z', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE_SUB("2024-08-01", INTERVAL 5 DAY))
current.value: (EXTRACT(DATE from DATETIME(time, "Europe/Berlin")) BETWEEN DATE('2024-06-30T22:00:00.000Z', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE_SUB("2024-08-01", INTERVAL 5 DAY))

query.rawSql:
SELECT CASE 

       --  case: "Last 24 HOURS "
    WHEN DATE('${__from:date:iso}', "Europe/Berlin") >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE("Europe/Berlin"), INTERVAL 4 DAY)  OR TIMESTAMP_DIFF(TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}'), TIMESTAMP('${__from:date:iso}'), HOUR) = 24 AND EXTRACT(DAY FROM DATETIME('${__from:date:iso}', "Europe/Berlin")) != EXTRACT(DAY FROM DATETIME('${__to:date:iso}', "Europe/Berlin")) OR TIMESTAMP_DIFF(TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}'), TIMESTAMP('${__from:date:iso}'), MINUTE) < 1439
    THEN """(EXTRACT(DATE from DATETIME(time, "Europe/Berlin"))  = DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE,INTERVAL 1 DAY))"""
    -- case: CURRENT_DATE()
    WHEN EXTRACT(DATE FROM TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}')) >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE("Europe/Berlin"), INTERVAL 4 DAY) 
    THEN  """(EXTRACT(DATE from DATETIME(time, "Europe/Berlin")) BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE_SUB("$HeuteDatum", INTERVAL 5 DAY))"""
    ELSE  """(EXTRACT(DATE from DATETIME(time, "Europe/Berlin")) BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin"))"""

    END
SELECT CURRENT_DATE("Europe/Berlin")

SELECT CASE "$LRA"
WHEN "NDR" THEN "episodenschnitt = 1"
ELSE "TRUE = TRUE" END

WHEN "NDR" THEN "Podcast-Daten werden mit 5 Tagen Verzögerung zur Verfügung gestellt."
WHEN "MDR" THEN "Podcast-Daten werden mit 3 Tagen Verzögerung zur Verfügung gestellt." END

current.text: (EXTRACT(DATE from DATETIME(time, "Europe/Berlin")) BETWEEN DATE('2024-06-30T22:00:00.000Z', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE_SUB("2024-08-01", INTERVAL 3 DAY))
current.value: (EXTRACT(DATE from DATETIME(time, "Europe/Berlin")) BETWEEN DATE('2024-06-30T22:00:00.000Z', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE_SUB("2024-08-01", INTERVAL 3 DAY))

query.rawSql:
SELECT CASE 

       --  case: "Last 24 HOURS "
    WHEN DATE('${__from:date:iso}', "Europe/Berlin") >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE("Europe/Berlin"), INTERVAL 2 DAY)  OR TIMESTAMP_DIFF(TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}'), TIMESTAMP('${__from:date:iso}'), HOUR) = 24 AND EXTRACT(DAY FROM DATETIME('${__from:date:iso}', "Europe/Berlin")) != EXTRACT(DAY FROM DATETIME('${__to:date:iso}', "Europe/Berlin")) OR TIMESTAMP_DIFF(TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}'), TIMESTAMP('${__from:date:iso}'), MINUTE) < 1439
    THEN """(EXTRACT(DATE from DATETIME(time, "Europe/Berlin"))  = DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE,INTERVAL 1 DAY))"""
    -- case: CURRENT_DATE()
    WHEN EXTRACT(DATE FROM TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}')) >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE("Europe/Berlin"), INTERVAL 2 DAY) 
    THEN  """(EXTRACT(DATE from DATETIME(time, "Europe/Berlin")) BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE_SUB("$HeuteDatum", INTERVAL 3 DAY))"""
    ELSE  """(EXTRACT(DATE from DATETIME(time, "Europe/Berlin")) BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin"))"""

    END

current.value: (EXTRACT(DATE from DATETIME(time, "Europe/Berlin")) BETWEEN DATE('2024-06-30T22:00:00.000Z', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE_SUB("2024-08-01", INTERVAL 5 DAY))

query.rawSql:
SELECT CASE "$LRA"
WHEN "NDR" THEN """$zeitraum_NDR"""
WHEN "MDR" THEN """$zeitraum_MDR"""
END

SELECT CASE 
-- case: last x<24 hours
    WHEN TIMESTAMP_DIFF(TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}'), TIMESTAMP('${__from:date:iso}'), HOUR) = 24 AND EXTRACT(DAY FROM DATETIME('${__from:date:iso}', "Europe/Berlin")) != EXTRACT(DAY FROM DATETIME('${__to:date:iso}', "Europe/Berlin")) OR TIMESTAMP_DIFF(TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}'), TIMESTAMP('${__from:date:iso}'), MINUTE) < 1439
    THEN   FORMAT_DATE("%d.%m.%y",DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE,INTERVAL 1 DAY))
-- SECOND case: today or bigger
    WHEN EXTRACT(DATE FROM TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}')) >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE("Europe/Berlin"), INTERVAL 2 DAY) AND EXTRACT(DATE FROM TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}')) >= "$datenstand_not_formated"
    THEN "$datenstand"
    WHEN EXTRACT(DATE FROM TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}')) >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE("Europe/Berlin"), INTERVAL 2 DAY) AND EXTRACT(DATE FROM TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}')) < "$datenstand_not_formated"
    THEN FORMAT_DATE("%d.%m.%y",DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE("Europe/Berlin"), INTERVAL 3 DAY))
ELSE CASE 
WHEN EXTRACT(DATE FROM TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}')) >= "$datenstand_not_formated" THEN "$datenstand"
ELSE FORMAT_DATE("%d.%m.%y",DATE_SUB(DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin"), INTERVAL 0 DAY))
END 
END

--FORMAT_DATETIME("%d.%m.%Y", )

SELECT CASE "$LRA"
WHEN "NDR" THEN """$toDay_NDR"""
WHEN "MDR" THEN """$toDay_MDR""" END

SELECT 
DATE(MAX(date))
FROM $episode_dataset
WHERE CASE WHEN "$Bereich" = "Alle Bereiche" THEN TRUE
ELSE CASE WHEN "$Podcast" = "All titles" THEN TRUE
ELSE broadcast_id = "${broadcast_id_branding}" END END

SELECT platform FROM (SELECT DISTINCT platform, 1 as sort 
FROM   $platform_dataset
UNION DISTINCT
SELECT "Alle Plattformen", 0 as sort)
WHERE platform != ""
Order by sort, platform ASC
